title: Focus On The Promise, Not The Problem | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Focus On The Promise, Not The Problem | Joel Osteen
description:
It isn’t the size of a problem that matters, it’s our perception. Instead of magnifying your problems, magnify your God—He is much bigger than anything you’re facing. 

 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
